subject: Fishing, Sport
lead_paragraph: Since I had moved from Maine’s spruce- and fir-laden coast to a job in Costa Rica’s capital city six months ago, I had barely thought of trout, much less caught one.
snippet: Since I had moved from Maine’s spruce- and fir-laden coast to a job in Costa Rica’s capital city six months ago, I had barely thought of trout, much less caught one.
